spirit_weapons.label: Spirit Weapons
spirit_weapons.description: Gives a chance to parry enemy melee attacks and reduces the threat generated by your melee attacks unless you are wearing a shield by 30%.

elemental_weapons.label: Elemental Weapons
elemental_weapons.description: Increases the damage caused by your Rockbiter Weapon by {a}%, your Windfury Weapon effect by {b}% and increases the damage caused by your Flametongue Weapon and Frostbrand Weapon by {c}%.

mental_quickness.label: Mental Quickness
mental_quickness.description: Reduces the mana cost of your instant cast Shaman spells by {a}% and increases your spell damage and healing by an amount equal to {b}% of your attack power.

weapon_mastery.label: Weapon Mastery
weapon_mastery.description: Increases the damage you deal with all weapons by {a}%.

weapon_specialization.label: Weapon Specialization
weapon_specialization.description: Increases your chance to hit with all weapons by an additional {a}%.

primal_wielding.label: Primal Wielding
primal_wielding.description:
Allows one-hand and off-hand weapons to be equipped in the off-hand.

Additionally, your Lightning Bolt and Molten Blast spells no longer delay your next melee swing, but deal 65% less damage if cast within 4.5 seconds after a melee attack.

stormstrike.label: Stormstrike
stormstrike.description: Instantly attack with your weapon, or both weapons if you are dual wielding. In addition, the target takes 5% additional Nature damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

unleashed_rage.label: Unleashed Rage
unleashed_rage.description: Causes your critical hits with melee attacks to increase all party and raid members' melee attack power by {a} if within 20 yards of the Shaman. Lasts 10 seconds.

shamanistic_rage.label: Shamanistic Rage
shamanistic_rage.description: Reduces all damage taken by 30% and causes your successful melee attacks to regenerate mana (based on weapon speed and attack power). Lasts 15 seconds.

improved_healing_wave.label: Improved Healing Wave
improved_healing_wave.description: Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by {a} sec.

tidal_focus.label: Tidal Focus
tidal_focus.description: Reduces the mana cost of your healing spells by {a}%.

improved_reincarnation.label: Improved Reincarnation
improved_reincarnation.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Reincarnation spell by {a} min and increases the amount of health and mana you reincarnate with by an additional {a}%.

ancestral_healing.label: Ancestral Healing
ancestral_healing.description: Increases your target's armor value by {a}% for 15 seconds after getting a critical effect from one of your healing spells.

totemic_focus.label: Totemic Focus
totemic_focus.description: Reduces the mana cost of your totems by {a}%.

natures_guidance.label: Nature's Guidance
natures_guidance.description: Increases your chance to hit with melee attacks and spells by {a}%.

healing_focus.label: Healing Focus
healing_focus.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any Shaman healing spell.

totemic_mastery.label: Totemic Mastery
totemic_mastery.description: The radius of your totems that affect friendly targets is increased to 30 yards.

healing_grace.label: Healing Grace
healing_grace.description: Reduces the threat generated by your healing spells by {a}% and reduces the chance your spells will be dispelled by {b}%.

restorative_totems.label: Restorative Totems
restorative_totems.description: Increases the effect of your Mana Spring and Healing Stream Totems by {a}%.

tidal_mastery.label: Tidal Mastery
tidal_mastery.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your healing and lightning spells by {a}%.

healing_way.label: Healing Way
healing_way.description: Your Healing Wave spells have a {a}% chance to increase the effect of subsequent Healing Wave spells on that target by 6% for 15 seconds. This effect will stack up to 3 times.

natures_swiftness.label: Nature's Swiftness
natures_swiftness.description: When activated, your next Nature spell with a casting time less than 10 sec. becomes an instant cast spell.

focused_mind.label: Focused Mind
focused_mind.description: Reduces the duration of any Silence or Interrupt effects used against the Shaman by {a}%. This effect does not stack with other similar effects.

purification.label: Purification
purification.description: Increases the effectiveness of your healing spells by {a}%.

mana_tide_totem.label: Mana Tide Totem
mana_tide_totem.description: Summons a Mana Tide Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 12 sec that restores 6% of total mana every 3 seconds to group members within 20 yards.

natures_guardian.label: Nature's Guardian
natures_guardian.description: Whenever a damaging attack is taken that reduces you below 30% health, you have a {a}% chance to heal 10% of your total health and reduce your threat level on that target. 5 second cooldown.

natures_blessing.label: Nature's Blessing
natures_blessing.description: Increases your spell damage and healing by an amount equal to {a}% of your Intellect.

improved_chain_heal.label: Improved Chain Heal
improved_chain_heal.description: Increases the amount healed by your Chain Heal spell by {a}%.

earth_shield.label: Earth Shield
earth_shield.description: Protects the target with an earthen shield, giving a 30% chance of ignoring spell interruption when damaged and causing attacks to heal the shielded target for 150. This effect can only occur once every few seconds. 6 charges. Lasts 600 seconds. Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time and only one Elemental Shield can be active on a target at a time.

improved_aspect_of_the_hawk.label: Improved Aspect of the Hawk
improved_aspect_of_the_hawk.description: While Aspect of the Hawk is active, all normal ranged attacks have a 10% chance of increasing ranged attack speed by {a}% for 12 seconds.

endurance_training.label: Endurance Training
endurance_training.description: Increases the Health of your pet by {a}% and your total health by {b}%.

focused_fire.label: Focused Fire
focused_fire.description: All damage caused by you is increased by {a}% while your pet is active and the critical strike chance of your Kill Command ability is increased by {b}%.

improved_aspect_of_the_monkey.label: Improved Aspect of the Monkey
improved_aspect_of_the_monkey.description: Increases the Dodge bonus of your Aspect of the Monkey by {a}%.

thick_hide.label: Thick Hide
thick_hide.description: Increases the armor rating of your pets by {a}% and your armor contribution from items by {b}%.

improved_revive_pet.label: Improved Revive Pet
improved_revive_pet.description: Revive Pet's casting time is reduced by {a} sec, mana cost is reduced by {b}%, and increases the health your pet returns with by an additional {c}%.

pathfinding.label: Pathfinding
pathfinding.description: Increases the speed bonus of your Aspect of the Cheetah and Aspect of the Pack by {a}%.

bestial_swiftness.label: Bestial Swiftness
bestial_swiftness.description: Increases the outdoor movement speed of your pets by 30%.

unleashed_fury.label: Unleashed Fury
unleashed_fury.description: Increases the damage done by your pets by {a}%.

improved_mend_pet.label: Improved Mend Pet
improved_mend_pet.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Mend Pet spell by {a}% and gives the Mend Pet spell a {b}% chance of cleansing 1 Curse, Disease, Magic or Poison effect from the pet each tick.

ferocity.label: Ferocity
ferocity.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your pet by {a}%.

spirit_bond.label: Spirit Bond
spirit_bond.description: While your pet is active, you and your pet will regenerate {a}% of total health every 10 seconds.

intimidation.label: Intimidation
intimidation.description: Command your pet to intimidate the target on the next successful melee attack, causing a high amount of threat and stunning the target for 3 seconds.

bestial_discipline.label: Bestial Discipline
bestial_discipline.description: Increases the Focus regeneration of your pets by {a}%.

animal_handler.label: Animal Handler
animal_handler.description: Increases your speed while mounted by {a}% and your pet's chance to hit by {b}%. The mounted movement speed increase does not stack with other effects.

frenzy.label: Frenzy
frenzy.description: Gives your pet a {a}% chance to gain a 30% attack speed increase for 8 seconds after dealing a critical strike.

ferocious_inspiration.label: Ferocious Inspiration
ferocious_inspiration.description: When your pet scores a critical hit, all party and raid members within 100 yards have all their damage increased by {a}% for 10 seconds.

bestial_wrath.label: Bestial Wrath
bestial_wrath.description: Send your pet into a rage causing 50% additional damage for 18 seconds. While enraged, the beast does not feel pity or remorse or fear and it cannot be stopped unless killed.

catlike_reflexes.label: Catlike Reflexes
catlike_reflexes.description: Increases your chance to dodge by {a}% and your pet's chance to dodge by an additional {b}%.

serpents_swiftness.label: Serpent's Swiftness
serpents_swiftness.description: Increases ranged combat attack speed by {a}% and your pet's melee attack speed by {b}%.

the_beast_within.label: The Beast Within
the_beast_within.description: When your pet is under the effects of Bestial Wrath, you also go into a rage causing 10% additional damage and reducing mana costs of all spells by 20% for 18 seconds. While enraged, you do not feel pity or remorse or fear and you cannot be stopped unless killed.

improved_concussive_shot.label: Improved Concussive Shot
improved_concussive_shot.description: Gives your Concussive Shot a 4% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.

lethal_shots.label: Lethal Shots
lethal_shots.description: Increases your critical strike chance with ranged weapons by 1%.

improved_hunters_mark.label: Improved Hunter's Mark
improved_hunters_mark.description: Causes 20% of your Hunter's Mark ability's base attack power to apply to melee attack power as well.

efficiency.label: Efficiency
efficiency.description: Reduces the Mana cost of your Shots and Stings by 2%.

go_for_the_throat.label: Go for the Throat
go_for_the_throat.description: Your ranged critical hits cause your pet to generate 25 Focus.

improved_arcane_shot.label: Improved Arcane Shot
improved_arcane_shot.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Arcane Shot by 0.2 sec.

aimed_shot.label: Aimed Shot
aimed_shot.description: An aimed shot that increases ranged damage by 70 and reduces healing done to that target by 50%. Lasts 10 seconds.

rapid_killing.label: Rapid Killing
rapid_killing.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Rapid Fire ability by 1 min. In addition, after killing an opponent that yields experience or honor, your next Aimed Shot, Arcane Shot or Auto Shot causes 10% additional damage. Lasts 20 seconds.

improved_stings.label: Improved Stings
improved_stings.description: Increases the damage done by your Serpent Sting and Wyvern Sting by 6% and the mana drained by your Viper Sting by 6%. In addition, reduces the chance your Stings will be dispelled by 6%.

mortal_shots.label: Mortal Shots
mortal_shots.description: Increases your ranged weapon critical strike damage bonus by 6%.

concussive_barrage.label: Concussive Barrage
concussive_barrage.description: Your successful Auto Shot attacks have a 2% chance to Daze the target for 4 seconds.

scatter_shot.label: Scatter Shot
scatter_shot.description: A short-range shot that deals 50% weapon damage and disorients the target for 4 seconds. Any damage caused will remove the effect. Turns off your attack when used.

barrage.label: Barrage
barrage.description: Increases the damage done by your Multi-Shot and Volley spells by 4%.

combats_experience.label: Combat Experience
combats_experience.description: Increases your total Agility by {a}% and your total Intellect by {b}%.

ranged_weapon_specialization.label: Ranged Weapon Specialization
ranged_weapon_specialization.description: Increases the damage you deal with ranged weapons by 1%.

careful_aim.label: Careful Aim
careful_aim.description: Increases your ranged attack power by an amount equal to 15% of your total Intellect.

silencing_shot.label: Silencing Shot
silencing_shot.description: A shot that deals 50% weapon damage and Silences the target for 3 seconds.

improved_barrage.label: Improved Barrage
improved_barrage.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Multi-Shot ability by 4% and gives you a 33% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Volley.

master_marksman.label: Master Marksman
master_marksman.description: Increases your ranged attack power by 2%.

trueshot_aura.label: Trueshot Aura
trueshot_aura.description: Increases the attack power of party and raid members within 45 yards by 50. Lasts until cancelled.

monster_slaying.label: Monster Slaying
monster_slaying.description: Increases all damage caused against Beasts, Giants and Dragonkin targets by 1% and increases critical damage caused against Beasts, Giants and Dragonkin targets by an additional 1%.

humanoid_slaying.label: Humanoid Slaying
humanoid_slaying.description: Increases all damage caused against Humanoid targets by 1% and increases critical damage caused against Humanoid targets by an additional 1%.

hawk_eye.label: Hawk Eye
hawk_eye.description: Increases the range of your ranged weapons by 2 yards.

savage_strikes.label: Savage Strikes
savage_strikes.description: Increases the critical strike chance of Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite by 10%.

entrapment.label: Entrapment
entrapment.description: Gives your Immolation Trap, Frost Trap, Explosive Trap, and Snake Trap a 8% chance to entrap the target, preventing them from moving for 4 seconds.

improved_wing_clip.label: Improved Wing Clip
improved_wing_clip.description: Gives your Wing Clip ability a 7% chance to immobilize the target for 5 seconds.

clever_trap.label: Clever Traps
clever_trap.description: Increases the duration of Freezing and Frost Trap effects by 15%, the damage of Immolation and Explosive Trap effects by 15%, and the number of snakes summoned from Snake Traps by 15%.

deterrence.label: Deterrence
deterrence.description: When activated, increases your Dodge and Parry chance by 25% for 10 seconds.

trap_mastery.label: Trap Mastery
trap_mastery.description: Decreases the chance enemies will resist trap effects by 5%.

surefooted.label: Surefooted
surefooted.description: Increases hit chance by 1% and increases the chance movement impairing effects will be resisted by an additional 5%.

improved_feign_death.label: Improved Feign Death
improved_feign_death.description: Reduces the chance your Feign Death ability will be resisted by 2%.

survival_instincts.label: Survival Instincts
survival_instincts.description: Reduces all damage taken by 2% and increases attack power by 2%.

killer_instinct.label: Killer Instinct
killer_instinct.description: Increases your critical strike chance with all attacks by 1%.

counterattack.label: Counterattack
counterattack.description: A strike that becomes active after parrying an opponent's attack. This attack deals 40 damage and immobilizes the target for 5 seconds. Counterattack cannot be blocked, dodged, or parried.

resourcefulness.label: Resourcefulness
resourcefulness.description: Reduces the mana cost of all traps and melee abilities by 20% and reduces the cooldown of all traps by 2 sec.

thrill_of_the_hunt.label: Thrill of the Hunt
thrill_of_the_hunt.description: Gives you a 33% chance to regain 40% of the mana cost of any shot when it critically hits.

wyvern_sting.label: Wyvern Sting
wyvern_sting.description: A stinging shot that puts the target to sleep for 12 seconds. Any damage will cancel the effect. When the target wakes up, the Sting causes 300 Nature damage over 12 seconds. Only one Sting per Hunter can be active on the target at a time.

expose_weakness.label: Expose Weakness
expose_weakness.description: Your ranged criticals have a 33% chance to apply an Expose Weakness effect to the target. Expose Weakness increases the attack power of all attackers against that target by 25% of your Agility for 7 seconds.

master_tactician.label: Master Tactician
master_tactician.description: Your successful ranged attacks have a 6% chance to increase your critical strike chance with all attacks by 2% for 8 seconds.

readiness.label: Readiness
readiness.description: When activated, this ability immediately finishes the cooldown on your other Hunter abilities.

spiritual_focus.label: Spiritual Focus
spiritual_focus.description: Gives your Flash of Light and Holy Light spells a {a}% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage.

improved_seal_of_righteousness.label: Improved Seal of Righteousness
improved_seal_of_righteousness.description: Increases the damage done by your Seal of Righteousness and Judgement of Righteousness by {a}%.

healing_light.label: Healing Light
healing_light.description: Increases the amount healed by your Holy Light and Flash of Light spells by {a}%.

aura_mastery.label: Aura Mastery
aura_mastery.description: Increases the radius of your Auras to 40 yards.

improved_lay_on_hands.label: Improved Lay on Hands
improved_lay_on_hands.description: Gives the target of your Lay on Hands spell a {a}% bonus to their armor value from items for 120 seconds. In addition, the cooldown for your Lay on Hands spell is reduced by {b} min.

unyielding_faith.label: Unyielding Faith
unyielding_faith.description: Increases your chance to resist Fear and Disorient effects by an additional {a}%.

illumination.label: Illumination
illumination.description: After getting a critical effect from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock heal spell, gives you a {a}% chance to gain mana equal to 75% of the base cost of the spell.

improved_blessing_of_wisdom.label: Improved Blessing of Wisdom
improved_blessing_of_wisdom.description: Increases the effect of your Blessing of Wisdom spell by {a}%.

overwhelming_light.label: Overwhelming Light
overwhelming_light.description: When your Holy Light, Flash of Light, or Holy Shock spells heal a target to full health, 3 nearby injured allies will be healed by an amount equal to {a}% of the healing effect.

pure_of_heart.label: Pure of Heart
pure_of_heart.description: Increases your resistance to Curse and Disease effects by {a}%.

divine_favor.label: Divine Favor
divine_favor.description: When activated, gives your next Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock spell a 100% critical effect chance.

sanctified_light.label: Sanctified Light
sanctified_light.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy Light, Seal of Light, and Judgement of Light spells by {a}%.

purifying_power.label: Purifying Power
purifying_power.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Cleanse, Purify and Consecration spells by {a}% and increases the critical strike chance of your Exorcism and Holy Wrath spells by {b}%. Additionally, hitting an enemy with Exorcism or Holy Wrath increases the critical effect chance of your next healing spell by {c}%.

holy_power.label: Holy Power
holy_power.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by {a}%.

lights_grace.label: Light's Grace
lights_grace.description: Gives your Holy Light spell a {a}% chance to reduce the cast time of your next Holy Light spell by 0.5 sec. This effect lasts 15 seconds.

holy_shock.label: Holy Shock
holy_shock.description: Blasts the target with Holy energy, causing 277 Holy damage to an enemy, or 351 healing to an ally.

blessed_life.label: Blessed Life
blessed_life.description: All attacks against you have a {a}% chance to cause half damage, and your resistances are increased by {b}.

holy_guidance.label: Holy Guidance
holy_guidance.description: Increases your spell damage and healing by {a}% of your total Intellect.

divine_illumination.label: Divine Illumination
divine_illumination.description: Increases the casting speed of all Paladin spells by 50% for 15 seconds. Causes Forebearance, preventing the use of Divine Shield, Divine Protection, Hand of Protection again for 60 seconds.

improved_devotion_aura.label: Improved Devotion Aura
improved_devotion_aura.description: Increases the armor bonus of your Devotion Aura by {a}%.

redoubt.label: Redoubt
redoubt.description: Damaging melee and ranged attacks against you have a 10% chance to increase your chance to block by {a}%. Lasts 10 seconds or 5 blocks.

precision.label: Precision
precision.description: Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons and spells by {a}%.

guardians_favor.label: Guardian's Favor
guardians_favor.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Hand of Protection by {a} sec and increases the duration of your Hand of Freedom by {b} sec.

toughness.label: Toughness
toughness.description: Increases your armor value from items by {a}%.

blessing_of_kings.label: Blessing of Kings
blessing_of_kings.description: Places a Blessing on the friendly target, increasing total stats by 10% for 600 seconds. Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

improved_righteous_fury.label: Improved Righteous Fury
improved_righteous_fury.description: While Righteous Fury is active, all damage taken is reduced by {a}% and increases the amount of threat generated by your Righteous Fury spell by {b}%.

shield_specialization.label: Shield Specialization
shield_specialization.description: Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your shield by {a}%.

improved_concentration_aura.label: Improved Concentration Aura
improved_concentration_aura.description: Increases the effect of your Concentration Aura by an additional {a}% and reduces the duration of any Silence or Interrupt effect used against an affected group member by {b}%. The duration reduction does not stack with any other effects.

stoicism.label: Stoicism
stoicism.description: Increases your resistance to Stun effects by an additional {a}% and reduces the chance your spells will be dispelled by an additional {b}%.

improved_hammer_of_justice.label: Improved Hammer of Justice
improved_hammer_of_justice.description: Decreases the cooldown of your Hammer of Justice spell by {a} sec.

spell_warding.label: Spell Warding
spell_warding.description: All spell damage taken is reduced by {a}%.

blessing_of_sanctuary.label: Blessing of Sanctuary
blessing_of_sanctuary.description: Places a Blessing on the friendly target, reducing damage dealt from all sources by up to 10 for 600 seconds. In addition, when the target blocks a melee attack the attacker will take 14 Holy damage. Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

reckoning.label: Reckoning
reckoning.description: Gives you a {a}% chance after being hit by any damaging attack that the next 4 weapon swings within 8 seconds will generate an additional attack.

sacred_duty.label: Sacred Duty
sacred_duty.description: Increases your total Stamina by {a}%, reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield spell by {b} sec and reduces the attack speed penalty by {c}%.

one_handed_weapon_specialization.label: One-Handed Weapon Specialization
one_handed_weapon_specialization.description: Increases all damage you deal when a one-handed melee weapon is equipped by {a}%.

improved_holy_shield.label: Improved Holy Shield
improved_holy_shield.description: Increases damage caused by your Holy Shield by {a}% and increases the number of charges of your Holy Shield by {b}.

holy_shield.label: Holy Shield
holy_shield.description: Increases chance to block by 30% for 10 seconds and deals 59 Holy damage for each attack blocked while active. Damage caused by Holy Shield causes 35% additional threat. Each block expends a charge. 4 charges.

ardent_defender.label: Ardent Defender
ardent_defender.description: When you have less than 35% health or when an attack brings you under 35% health, all damage taken is reduced by {a}%.

combat_expertise.label: Combat Expertise
combat_expertise.description: Reduces your chance to be dodged or parried by {a}% and increases your total Stamina by {b}%.

avengers_shield.label: Avenger's Shield
avengers_shield.description: Hurls a holy shield at the enemy, dealing 270 Holy damage, Dazing them and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets. Lasts 6 seconds.

improved_blessing_of_might.label: Improved Blessing of Might
improved_blessing_of_might.description: Increases the attack power bonus of your Blessing of Might by {a}%.

benediction.label: Benediction
benediction.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Judgement and Seal spells by {a}%.

improved_judgement.label: Improved Judgement
improved_judgement.description: Decreases the cooldown of your Judgement spell by {a} sec.

improved_crusader_strike.label: Improved Crusader Strike
improved_crusader_strike.description: In addition to the normal effect, your Crusader Strike spell will also increase the critical strike chance of all spells and attacks made against that target by an additional {a}%.

vindication.label: Vindication
vindication.description: Gives the Paladin's damaging melee attacks a chance to reduce the target's attributes by {a}% for 15 seconds.

conviction.label: Conviction
conviction.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by {a}%.

seal_of_command.label: Seal of Command
seal_of_command.description:
Gives the Paladin a chance to deal additional Holy damage equal to 70% of normal weapon damage. Persists for 0.5 seconds when swapping to any other Seal. Lasts 30 seconds.

Unleashing this Seal's energy will judge an enemy, instantly causing 157.5 Holy damage, 316 if the target is stunned or incapacitated.

pursuit_of_justice.label: Pursuit of Justice
pursuit_of_justice.description: Reduces the chance you'll be hit by spells by {a}% and increases movement and mounted movement speed by {b}%. This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.

eye_for_an_eye.label: Eye for an Eye
eye_for_an_eye.description: All spell criticals against you cause {a}% of the damage taken to the caster as well. The damage caused by Eye for an Eye will not exceed 50% of the Paladin's total health.

improved_retribution_aura.label: Improved Retribution Aura
improved_retribution_aura.description: Increases the damage done by your Retribution Aura by {a}%.

crusade.label: Crusade
crusade.description: Increases all damage caused against Humanoids, Demons, Undead and Elementals by {a}%.

two_handed_weapon_specialization.label: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
two_handed_weapon_specialization.description: Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by {a}%.

sanctity_aura.label: Sanctity Aura
sanctity_aura.description: Increases Holy damage done by party and raid members within 30 yards by 10%. Players may only have one Aura on them per Paladin at any one time.

improved_sanctity_aura.label: Improved Sanctity Aura
improved_sanctity_aura.description: The amount of damage caused by targets affected by Sanctity Aura is increased by {a}%.

vengeance.label: Vengeance
vengeance.description: Gives you a {a}% bonus to Holy damage you deal for 30 seconds after dealing a critical strike from a weapon swing, spell, or ability. This effect stacks up to 3 times.

sanctified_judgement.label: Sanctified Judgement
sanctified_judgement.description: Gives your Judgement spell a {a}% chance to return 80% of the mana cost of the judged seal and a {a} chance to refresh all Judgements on the target.

sanctified_seals.label: Sanctified Seals
sanctified_seals.description: Increases your chance to critically hit with all spells and melee attacks by {a}% and reduces the chance your Seals will be dispelled by {a}%.

repentance.label: Repentance
repentance.description: Puts the enemy target in a state of meditation, incapacitating them for up to 6 seconds. Any damage caused will awaken the target. Only works against Humanoids.

divine_purpose.label: Divine Purpose
divine_purpose.description: Melee and ranged critical strikes against you cause {a}% less damage.

fanaticism.label: Fanaticism
fanaticism.description: Increases the critical strike chance of all Judgements capable of a critical hit by {a}% and reduces threat caused by all actions by {a}% except when under the effects of Righteous Fury.

verdict.label: Verdict
verdict.description: An instant strike that deals 90% weapon damage as Holy damage and empowers your next Holy spell or ability with a duration of less than 20 seconds by 25%.

starlight_wrath.label: Starlight Wrath
starlight_wrath.description: Reduces the cast time of your Wrath and Starfire spells by {a} sec.

natures_grasp.label: Nature's Grasp
natures_grasp.description: While active, any time an enemy strikes the caster they have a 35% chance to become afflicted by Entangling Roots (Rank 1). Only useable outdoors. 1 charge. Lasts 45 seconds.

improved_natures_grasp.label: Improved Nature's Grasp
improved_natures_grasp.description: Increases the chance for your Nature's Grasp to entangle an enemy by {a}%.

control_of_nature.label: Control of Nature
control_of_nature.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting Entangling Roots and Cyclone.

focused_starlight.label: Focused Starlight
focused_starlight.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Wrath, Enervate, Zenith and Starfire spells by {a}%.

improved_moonfire.label: Improved Moonfire
improved_moonfire.description: Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire spell by {a}%.

brambles.label: Brambles
brambles.description: Increases damage caused by your Thorns and Entangling Roots spells by {a}%.

insect_swarm.label: Insect Swarm
insect_swarm.description: The enemy target is swarmed by insects, decreasing their chance to hit by 2% and causing 108 Nature damage over 12 seconds.

natures_reach.label: Nature's Reach
natures_reach.description: Increases the range of your Balance spells and Faerie Fire (Feral) ability by {a}%.

vengeance.label: Vengeance
vengeance.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Starfire, Moonfire, Enervate, Zenith and Wrath spells by {a}%.

celestial_starlight.label: Celestial Focus
celestial_starlight.description: Gives your Starfire spell a {a}% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds and increases the chance you'll resist spell interruption when casting your Wrath, Zenith, Enervate or Starfire spells by {b}%.

lunar_guidance.label: Lunar Guidance
lunar_guidance.description: Increases your Intellect by {a}% and your spell damage and healing by 10% of your total Intellect.

natures_grace.label: Nature's Grace
natures_grace.description: All spell criticals grace you with a blessing of nature, reducing the casting time of your next spell by 0.5 sec.

zenith.label: Zenith
zenith.description: Causes 235 to 290 Arcane damage to the target and 118 to 140 damage to up to 4 enemies within 5 yards of the target. Only usable after 3 casts of Starfire.

moonglow.label: Moonglow
moonglow.description: Reduces the Mana cost of your Moonfire, Starfire, Wrath, Hurricane, Healing Touch, Regrowth and Rejuvenation spells by {a}%.

moonfury.label: Moonfury
moonfury.description: Increases the damage done by your Starfire, Moonfire, Zenith, Enervate and Wrath spells by {a}%.

balance_of_power.label: Balance of Power
balance_of_power.description: Increases your chance to hit with all attacks and spells and reduces the chance you'll be hit by spells by {a}%.

dreamstate.label: Dreamstate
dreamstate.description: Regenerate mana equal to {a}% of your Intellect every 5 sec, even while casting.

moonkin_form.label: Moonkin Form
moonkin_form.description:
Shapeshift into Moonkin Form. While in this form the armor contribution from items is increased by 400%, attack power is increased by 150% of your level, all party and raid members within 100 yards have their spell critical chance increased by 2%, threat generation is reduced by 20% and your spell critical strike chance is increased by an additional 3%. Melee attacks in this form have a chance on hit to regenerate mana based on attack power, and receiving damage has a chance to enrage you. The Moonkin can only cast Balance and non-healing Restoration spells.
The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.

improved_faerie_fire.label: Improved Faerie Fire
improved_faerie_fire.description: Your Faerie Fire spell also increases the chance the target will be hit by melee and ranged attacks by {a}%.

wrath_of_cenarius.label: Wrath of Cenarius
wrath_of_cenarius.description: Your Starfire spell gains an additional 4% and your Wrath gains an additional {a}% of your bonus damage effects.

force_of_nature.label: Force of Nature
force_of_nature.description: Summons 3 treants to attack enemy targets for 30 seconds. These treants take 20% reduced damage, 70% reduced Area of Effect damage and while any treant is alive you gain 10% increased intellect.

ferocity.label: Ferocity
ferocity.description: Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, Rake and Mangle abilities by {a} Rage or Energy.

feral_aggression.label: Feral Aggression
feral_aggression.description: Increases the attack power reduction of your Demoralizing Roar by {a}% and the damage caused by your Ferocious Bite by {b}%.

feral_instinct.label: Feral Instinct
feral_instinct.description: Increases threat caused in Bear and Dire Bear Form by {a}% and reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Prowling.

brutal_impact.label: Brutal Impact
brutal_impact.description: Increases the stun duration of your Bash and Pounce abilities by {a} sec.

thick_hide.label: Thick Hide
thick_hide.description: Increases your Armor contribution from items by {a}%.

feral_swiftness.label: Feral Swiftness
feral_swiftness.description: Increases your movement speed by {a}% while outdoors in Cat Form and increases your chance to dodge while in Cat Form, Bear Form and Dire Bear Form by 4%.

feral_charge.label: Feral Charge
feral_charge.description: Causes you to charge an enemy, immobilizing and interrupting any spell being cast for 4 seconds.

sharpened_claws.label: Sharpened Claws
sharpened_claws.description: Increases your melee critical strike chance while in Bear, Dire Bear, Cat Form, or Moonkin Form by {a}%.

shredding_attacks.label: Shredding Attacks
shredding_attacks.description: Reduces the energy cost of your Shred ability by {a} and the rage cost of your Lacerate ability by {b}.

predatory_strikes.label: Predatory Strikes
predatory_strikes.description: Increases your melee attack power in Cat, Bear, Dire Bear and Moonkin Forms by {a}% of your level.

primal_fury.label: Primal Fury
primal_fury.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to gain an additional 5 Rage anytime you get a critical strike while in Bear and Dire Bear Form and your critical strikes from Cat Form abilities that add combo points have a {a}% chance to add an additional combo point.

savage_fury.label: Savage Fury
savage_fury.description: Increases the damage caused by your Claw, Rake, and Mangle (Cat) abilities by {a}%.

faerie_fire_feral.label: Faerie Fire (Feral)
faerie_fire_feral.description: Decrease the armor of the target by 175 for 40 seconds. While affected, the target cannot stealth or turn invisible.

nurturing_instinct.label: Nurturing Instinct
nurturing_instinct.description: Increases your healing spells by up to {a}% of your Agility, and increases healing done to you by {b}% while in Cat form.

heart_of_the_wild.label: Heart of the Wild
heart_of_the_wild.description: Increases your Intellect by {a}%. In addition, while in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by {a}% and while in Cat Form your attack power is increased by {b}%.

survival_of_the_fittest.label: Survival of the Fittest
survival_of_the_fittest.description: Increases all attributes by {a}% and reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by melee attacks by {a}%.

primal_tenacity.label: Primal Tenacity
primal_tenacity.description: Increases your chance to resist Stun and Fear mechanics by {a}%.

leader_of_the_pack.label: Leader of the Pack
leader_of_the_pack.description: While in Cat, Bear or Dire Bear Form, the Leader of the Pack increases ranged and melee critical chance of all party and raid members within 45 yards by 2%. In addition your own melee critical chance is increased by an additional 3%.

improved_leader_of_the_pack.label: Improved Leader of the Pack
improved_leader_of_the_pack.description: Your Leader of the Pack ability also causes affected targets to have a 100% chance to heal themselves for {a}% of their total health when they critically hit with a melee or ranged attack. The healing effect cannot occur more than once every 6 sec.

predatory_instincts.label: Predatory Instincts
predatory_instincts.description: While in Cat Form, Bear Form, or Dire Bear Form, increases your damage from melee critical strikes by {a}% and your chance to avoid area effect attacks by {b}%.

mangle.label: Mangle
mangle.description: Mangle the target, inflicting damage and causing the target to take additional damage from bleed effects for 12 seconds. This ability can be used in Cat Form or Dire Bear Form.

improved_mark_of_the_wild.label: Improved Mark of the Wild
improved_mark_of_the_wild.description: Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by {a}%.

furor.label: Furor
furor.description: Gives you {a}% chance to gain 15 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear and Dire Bear Form or 60 Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form.

naturalist.label: Naturalist
naturalist.description: Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by {a} sec and increases the damage you deal with physical attacks in all forms by {b}%.

natures_focus.label: Nature's Focus
natures_focus.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting the Healing Touch, Regrowth and Tranquility spells.

natural_shapeshifter.label: Natural Shapeshifter
natural_shapeshifter.description: Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by {a}%.

intensity.label: Intensity
intensity.description: Allows {a}% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting and causes your Enrage ability to instantly generate {b} rage.

subtlety.label: Subtlety
subtlety.description: Reduces the threat generated by your spells by {a}% and reduces the chance your spells will be dispelled by {b}%.

omen_of_clarity.label: Omen of Clarity
omen_of_clarity.description: Each of your melee attacks have a chance of causing you to enter a Clearcasting state. The Clearcasting state reduces the Mana, Rage or Energy cost of your next damage or healing spell or offensive ability by 100%.

overgrowth.label: Overgrowth
overgrowth.description: Applies Rejuvenation (Rank 3) to your friendly target and that target's party members within 25 yards.

tranquil_spirit.label: Tranquil Spirit
tranquil_spirit.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Healing Touch and Tranquility spells by {a}%.

improved_rejuvenation.label: Improved Rejuvenation
improved_rejuvenation.description: Increases the effect of your Rejuvenation spell by {a}%.

natures_swiftness.label: Nature's Swiftness
natures_swiftness.description: When activated, your next Nature spell becomes an instant cast spell.

gift_of_nature.label: Gift of Nature
gift_of_nature.description: Increases the effect of all healing spells by {a}%.

improved_tranquility.label: Improved Tranquility
improved_tranquility.description: Reduces threat caused by Tranquility by {a}%.

empowered_touch.label: Empowered Touch
empowered_touch.description: Your Healing Touch spell gains an additional {a}% of your bonus healing effects.

improved_regrowth.label: Improved Regrowth
improved_regrowth.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by {a}%.

swiftmend.label: Swiftmend
swiftmend.description: Consumes a Rejuvenation or Regrowth effect on a friendly target to instantly heal them an amount equal to 12 sec. of Rejuvenation or 18 sec. of Regrowth.

natural_perfection.label: Natural Perfection
natural_perfection.description: Your critical strike chance with all spells is increased by {a}% and critical strikes against you give you the Natural Perfection effect reducing all damage taken by {b}%. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts 8 seconds.

empowered_rejuvenation.label: Empowered Rejuvenation
empowered_rejuvenation.description: The bonus healing effects of your healing over time spells is increased by {a}%.

tree_of_life.label: Tree of Life
tree_of_life.description:
Shapeshift into the Tree of Life. While in this form you increase healing received by 25% of your total Spirit for all party members within 45 yards, your movement speed is reduced by 20%, and you can only cast Swiftmend, Innervate, Nature's Swiftness, Barkskin, non-healing Restoration spells, and healing over time spells, but the mana cost of these spells is reduced by 20%.

The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.

unbreakable_will.label: Unbreakable Will
unbreakable_will.description: Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional {a}%.

wand_specialization.label: Wand Specialization
wand_specialization.description: Increases your damage with Wands by {a}%.

silent_resolve.label: Silent Resolve
silent_resolve.description: Reduces the threat generated by your Holy and Discipline spells by {a}% and reduces the chance your spells will be dispelled by {a}%.

improved_power_word_fortitude.label: Improved Power Word: Fortitude
improved_power_word_fortitude.description: Increases the effect of your Power Word: Fortitude and Prayer of Fortitude spells by {a}%.

improved_power_word_shield.label: Improved Power Word: Shield
improved_power_word_shield.description: Increases the damage absorbed by your Power Word: Shield by {a}%.

martyrdom.label: Martyrdom
martyrdom.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to gain the Focused Casting effect that lasts for 6 seconds after being the victim of a melee or ranged critical strike. The Focused Casting effect prevents you from losing casting time when taking damage while casting Priest spells and increases resistance to Interrupt effects by {b}%.

absolution.label: Absolution
absolution.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Dispel Magic, Cure Disease, Abolish Disease and Mass Dispel spells by {a}%.

inner_focus.label: Inner Focus
inner_focus.description: When activated, reduces the mana cost of your next spell by 100% and increases its critical effect chance by 25% if it is capable of a critical effect.

meditation.label: Meditation
meditation.description: Allows {a}% of your mana regeneration to continue while casting.

improved_inner_fire.label: Improved Inner Fire
improved_inner_fire.description: Increases the armor bonus of your Inner Fire spell by {a}% and increases the number of charges by {a}.

mental_agility.label: Mental Agility
mental_agility.description: Reduces the mana cost of your instant cast spells by {a}%.

improved_mana_burn.label: Improved Mana Burn
improved_mana_burn.description: Reduces the casting time of your Mana Burn spell by {a} sec.

improved_divine_spirit.label: Improved Divine Spirit
improved_divine_spirit.description: Increases the effect of Divine Spirit and Prayer of Spirit by {a}% and they now also increase the target's spell damage and healing by an amount equal to {b}% of their total Spirit.

pain_suppression.label: Pain Suppression
pain_suppression.description: Instantly reduces a friendly target's threat by 5%, reduces all damage taken by 40% and increases resistance to Dispel mechanics by 65% for 8 seconds.

focused_power.label: Focused Power
focused_power.description: Your Mind Blast, Mass Dispel, and damaging Holy spells have an additional {a}% chance to hit. In addition, your Mass Dispel cast time is reduced by {b} sec.

force_of_will.label: Force of Will
force_of_will.description: Increases your spell damage by {a}% and the critical strike chance of your offensive spells by {a}%.

focused_will.label: Focused Will
focused_will.description: After taking a critical hit you gain the Focused Will effect, reducing all damage taken by {a}% and increasing healing effects on you by {b}%. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts 8 seconds.

power_infusion.label: Power Infusion
power_infusion.description: Infuses the target with power, increasing spell casting speed by 20% and reducing the mana cost of all spells by 20%. Lasts 15 seconds.

reflective_shield.label: Reflective Shield
reflective_shield.description: Causes {a}% of the damage absorbed by your Power Word: Shield to reflect back at the attacker. This damage causes no threat.

enlightenment.label: Enlightenment
enlightenment.description: Increases your total Stamina, Intellect and Spirit by {a}%.

power_word_barrier.label: Power Word: Barrier
power_word_barrier.description: Create a barrier around you, absorbing damage dealt to all party and raid members within it. The barrier lasts for 10 seconds or until it absorbs 3935 damage, increased by up to 250% when affecting a large group. Priest must channel to maintain the spell.

holy_focus.label: Holy Focus
holy_focus.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any Holy spell.

improved_renew.label: Improved Renew
improved_renew.description: Increases the amount healed by your Renew spell by {a}%.

holy_specialization.label: Holy Specialization
holy_specialization.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by {a}%.

spell_warding.label: Spell Warding
spell_warding.description: Reduces all spell damage taken by {a}%.

divine_fury.label: Divine Fury
divine_fury.description: Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Heal and Greater Heal spells by {a} sec.

holy_nova.label: Holy Nova
holy_nova.description: Causes an explosion of holy light around the caster, causing 36 Holy damage to all enemy targets within 10 yards and healing all party members within 10 yards for 68. These effects cause no threat.

blessed_recovery.label: Blessed Recovery
blessed_recovery.description: After being struck by a melee or ranged critical hit, heal {a}% of the damage taken over 6 seconds.

searing_light.label: Searing Light
searing_light.description: Increases the damage of your Smite and Holy Fire spells by {a}%.

improved_healing.label: Improved Healing
improved_healing.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Lesser Heal, Heal, and Greater Heal spells by {a}%.

inspiration.label: Inspiration
inspiration.description: Increases your target's armor by {a}% for 15 seconds after getting a critical effect from your Flash Heal, Heal, Greater Heal, Binding Heal, Prayer of Healing, or Circle of Healing spell.

holy_reach.label: Holy Reach
holy_reach.description: Increases the range of your Smite and Holy Fire spells and the radius of your Prayer of Healing, Holy Nova and Circle of Healing spells by {a}%.

healing_prayers.label: Healing Prayers
healing_prayers.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Prayer of Healing and Prayer of Mending spell by {a}%.

spirit_of_redemption.label: Spirit of Redemption
spirit_of_redemption.description: Increases total Spirit by 5% and upon death, the priest becomes the Spirit of Redemption for 15 seconds. The Spirit of Redemption cannot move, attack, be attacked or targeted by any spells or effects. While in this form the priest can cast any healing spell free of cost. When the effect ends, the priest dies.

spiritual_guidance.label: Spiritual Guidance
spiritual_guidance.description: Increases spell damage and healing by up to {a}% of your total Spirit.

surge_of_light.label: Surge of Light
surge_of_light.description: Your spell criticals have a {a}% chance to cause your next Smite spell to be instant cast, cost no mana but be incapable of a critical hit. This effect lasts 10 seconds.

spiritual_healing.label: Spiritual Healing
spiritual_healing.description: Increases the amount healed by your healing spells by {a}%.

holy_concentration.label: Holy Concentration
holy_concentration.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to enter a Clearcasting state after casting any Flash Heal, Binding Heal, or Greater Heal spell. The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next Flash Heal, Binding Heal, or Greater Heal spell by 100%.

lightwell.label: Lightwell
lightwell.description: Creates a Holy Lightwell. Members of your raid or party can click the Lightwell to restore 801 health over 6 seconds. Any direct damage taken will cancel the effect. Each member can only use this Lightwell once. Lightwell lasts for 180 seconds or 15 charges.

blessed_resilience.label: Blessed Resilience
blessed_resilience.description: Critical hits made against you have a {a}% chance to prevent you from being critically hit again for 6 seconds.

empowered_healing.label: Empowered Healing
empowered_healing.description: Your Greater Heal spell gains an additional {a}% and your Flash Heal and Binding Heal gain an additional {a}% of your bonus healing effects.

circle_of_healing.label: Circle of Healing
circle_of_healing.description: Heals friendly target and that target's party members within 15 yards of the target for 256.

spirit_tap.label: Spirit Tap
spirit_tap.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to gain a 100% bonus to your Spirit after killing a target that yields experience or honor. For the duration, your mana will regenerate at a 50% rate while casting. Lasts 15 seconds.

blackout.label: Blackout
blackout.description: Gives your Shadow damage spells a {a}% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.

shadow_affinity.label: Shadow Affinity
shadow_affinity.description: Reduces the threat generated by your Shadow spells by {a}%.

improved_shadow_word_pain.label: Improved Shadow Word: Pain
improved_shadow_word_pain.description: Increases the duration of your Shadow Word: Pain spell by {a} sec.

shadow_focus.label: Shadow Focus
shadow_focus.description: Reduces your target's chance to resist your Shadow spells by {a}%.

improved_psychic_scream.label: Improved Psychic Scream
improved_psychic_scream.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Psychic Scream spell by {a} sec.

improved_mind_blast.label: Improved Mind Blast
improved_mind_blast.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Mind Blast spell by {a} sec.

mind_flay.label: Mind Flay
mind_flay.description: Assault the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 75 Shadow damage over 3 seconds and slowing their movement speed by 50%.

improved_fade.label: Improved Fade
improved_fade.description: Decreases the cooldown of your Fade ability by {a} sec.

shadow_reach.label: Shadow Reach
shadow_reach.description: Increases the range of your offensive Shadow spells by {a}%.

shadow_weaving.label: Shadow Weaving
shadow_weaving.description: Your Shadow damage spells have a {a}% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Shadow damage. This vulnerability increases the Shadow damage dealt to your target by 2% and lasts 15 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

silence.label: Silence
silence.description: Silences the target, preventing them from casting spells for 5 seconds.

vampiric_embrace.label: Vampiric Embrace
vampiric_embrace.description: Afflicts your target with Shadow energy that causes all party members to be healed for 15% of any Shadow spell damage you deal for 60 seconds.

improved_vampiric_embrace.label: Improved Vampiric Embrace
improved_vampiric_embrace.description: Increases the percentage healed by Vampiric Embrace by an additional {a}%.

focused_mind.label: Focused Mind
focused_mind.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Mind Blast, Mind Control and Mind Flay spells by {a}%.

shadow_resilience.label: Shadow Resilience
shadow_resilience.description: Reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by all spells by {a}%.

darkness.label: Darkness
darkness.description: Increases your Shadow spell damage by {a}%.

psionic_overload.label: Psionic Overload
psionic_overload.description: After generating mana through Vampiric Touch and after you surpass a value based on your spell damage and spirit your next Mind Flay will also launch 3 bolts of shadow damage.

shadowform.label: Shadowform
shadowform.description: Assume a Shadowform, increasing your Shadow damage by 15% and reducing Physical damage done to you by 15%. However, you may not cast Holy spells while in this form.

shadow_power.label: Shadow Power
shadow_power.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death spells and your Psionic Overload talent by {a}%.

misery.label: Misery
misery.description: Your Shadow Word: Pain, Mind Flay and Vampiric Touch spells also cause the target to take an additional {a}% spell damage.

vampiric_touch.label: Vampiric Touch
vampiric_touch.description: Causes 450 Shadow damage over 15 seconds to your target and causes all party members to gain mana equal to 5% of any Shadow spell damage you deal.

suppression.label: Suppression
suppression.description: Reduces the chance for enemies to resist your Affliction spells by {a}%.

improved_corruption.label: Improved Corruption
improved_corruption.description: Reduces the casting time of your Corruption spell by {a} sec, and the casting time of your Seed of Corruption spell by {a} sec.

improved_curse_of_weakness.label: Improved Curse of Weakness
improved_curse_of_weakness.description: Increases the effect of your Curse of Weakness by {a}%.

improved_drain_soul.label: Improved Drain Soul
improved_drain_soul.description: Returns {a}% of your maximum mana if the target is killed by you while you drain its soul, and increases the damage of Drain Soul by {b}%. In addition, your Affliction spells generate {c}% less threat.

improved_life_tap.label: Improved Life Tap
improved_life_tap.description: Increases the amount of Mana awarded by your Life Tap spell by {a}%.

soul_siphon.label: Soul Siphon
soul_siphon.description: Increases the amount drained by your Drain Life and Drain Soul spells by an additional {a}% for each Affliction effect on the target, up to a maximum of {b}% additional effect.

improved_bane_of_agony.label: Improved Bane of Agony
improved_bane_of_agony.description: Increases the damage done by your Bane of Agony by {a}%.

fel_concentration.label: Fel Concentration
fel_concentration.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling the Drain Life, Drain Mana, or Drain Soul spell.

amplify_bane.label: Amplify Bane
amplify_bane.description: Increases the effect of your next Bane of Doom or Bane of Agony by 50%, your next Bane of Exhaustion by an additional 20%, or your next Bane of Tongues by an additional 10%. Lasts 30 seconds.

grim_reach.label: Grim Reach
grim_reach.description: Increases the range of your Affliction spells by {a}%.

nightfall.label: Nightfall
nightfall.description: Gives your Corruption, Drain Life, and Seed of Corruption spells a {a}% chance to cause you to enter a Shadow Trance state after damaging the opponent. The Shadow Trance state reduces the casting time of your next Shadow Bolt spell by 100%.

empowered_corruption.label: Empowered Corruption
empowered_corruption.description: Your Corruption spell gains an additional {a}% of your bonus spell damage effects, and your Seed of Corruption requires {b}% less damage to trigger its explosion.

shadow_embrace.label: Shadow Embrace
shadow_embrace.description: Your Corruption, Bane of Agony, Siphon Life and Seed of Corruption spells also cause the Shadow Embrace effect, which reduces physical damage caused by {a}%.

siphon_life.label: Siphon Life
siphon_life.description: Transfers 15 health from the target to the caster every 3 sec. Lasts 30 seconds.

bane_of_exhaustion.label: Bane of Exhaustion
bane_of_exhaustion.description: Reduces the target's movement speed by 30% for 12 seconds. Only one Bane per Warlock can be active on any one target.

improved_shadow_bite.label: Improved Shadow Bite
improved_shadow_bite.description: Your Felhunter regains {a}% of its maximum mana each time it hits with its Shadow Bite ability.

shadow_mastery.label: Shadow Mastery
shadow_mastery.description: Increases the damage dealt or life drained by your Shadow spells by {a}%.

contagion.label: Contagion
contagion.description: Increases the damage of Bane of Agony, Corruption, Siphon Life, Bane of Doom and Seed of Corruption by {a}% and reduces the chance your Affliction spells will be dispelled by an additional {b}%.

dark_pact.label: Dark Pact
dark_pact.description: Drains 305 of your pet's Mana, returning 100% to you.

improved_howl_of_terror.label: Improved Howl of Terror
improved_howl_of_terror.description: Reduces the casting time of your Howl of Terror spell by {a} sec.

malediction.label: Malediction
malediction.description: Increases the damage bonus effect of your Curse of the Elements spell by an additional {a}%.

unstable_affliction.label: Unstable Affliction
unstable_affliction.description: Shadow energy slowly destroys the target, causing 822 damage over 18 seconds. In addition, if the Unstable Affliction is dispelled it will cause 1224 damage to the dispeller and silence them for 5 seconds.

improved_healthstone.label: Improved Healthstone
improved_healthstone.description: Increases the amount of Health restored by your Healthstone by {a}%.

improved_imp.label: Improved Imp
improved_imp.description: Increases the effect of your Imp's Firebolt, Fire Shield, and Blood Pact spells by {a}%.

demonic_embrace.label: Demonic Embrace
demonic_embrace.description: Increases your total Stamina by {a}% but reduces your total Spirit by {b}%.

improved_health_funnel.label: Improved Health Funnel
improved_health_funnel.description: Increases the amount of Health transferred by your Health Funnel spell by {a}% and reduces the initial health cost by {a}%.

improved_voidwalker.label: Improved Voidwalker
improved_voidwalker.description: Increases the effectiveness of your Voidwalker's Torment, Consume Shadows, Sacrifice and Suffering spells by {a}%.

fel_intellect.label: Fel Intellect
fel_intellect.description: Increases the Intellect of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, Felhunter and Felguard by {a}% and increases your maximum mana by {b}%.

improved_succubus.label: Improved Succubus
improved_succubus.description: Increases the effect of your Succubus' Lash of Pain and Soothing Kiss spells by {a}%, and increases the duration of your Succubus' Seduction and Lesser Invisibility spells by {a}%.

fel_domination.label: Fel Domination
fel_domination.description: Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, Felhunter or Felguard Summon spell has its casting time reduced by 5.5 sec and its Mana cost reduced by 50%.

fel_stamina.label: Fel Stamina
fel_stamina.description: Increases the Stamina of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, Felhunter and Felguard by {a}% and increases your maximum health by {b}%.

demonic_aegis.label: Demonic Aegis
demonic_aegis.description: Increases the effectiveness of your Demon Armor and Fel Armor spells by {a}%.

master_summoner.label: Master Summoner
master_summoner.description: Reduces the casting time of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, Felhunter and Fel Guard Summoning spells by {a} sec and the Mana cost by {b}%.

unholy_power.label: Unholy Power
unholy_power.description: Increases the damage done by your Voidwalker, Succubus, Felhunter and Felguard's melee attacks and your Imp's Firebolt by {a}%.

improved_enslave_demon.label: Improved Enslave Demon
improved_enslave_demon.description: Reduces the Attack Speed and Casting Speed penalty of your Enslave Demon spell by {a}% and reduces the resist chance by {a}%.

demonic_empowerment.label: Demonic Empowerment
demonic_empowerment.description:
Grants the Warlock's summoned demon Empowerment.

Imp: Your Imp's Firebolts have a 100% chance to critically hit and cost no mana for 8 seconds.

Voidwalker: Summon demonic plating onto your Voidwalker, increasing its armor by 15% and improving its threat generation by 10%. Lasts 8 seconds.

Succubus: Your Succubus casts Partial Invisibility, causing all melee and ranged attacks made against it to have a 75% chance to miss and increasing its damage by 10%.

Felhunter: Sacrifice 10% to 20% of your maximum health to empower your Felhunter's Spell Lock ability, reducing its cooldown by 10 seconds for 20 seconds. Must be above 20% health to cast.

Felguard: Your Felguard hurls their weapon at the target and enrages, stunning the target for 4 seconds and increasing its damage dealt by 15% for 10 seconds.

Infernal: Your Infernal becomes immune to all attacks and spells for 6 seconds.

Doomguard: Your Doomguard casts Shadow Bolt Volley, dealing 1016 Shadow damage to all nearby enemies within 30 yards.

Enslaved Demon: Apply Demonic Frenzy to your Enslaved Demon, causing it to take 344 damage every 2 seconds and increasing its attack speed by 20% and casting speed by 10% for 10 seconds.

master_conjuror.label: Master Conjuror
master_conjuror.description: Reduces the casting time of conjuring stones by {a} sec. Increases the bonus Fire damage from Firestones and the Firestone effect by {b}%. Spellstone now also grants an absorption effect when used. Increases the amount of health you gain from resurrecting via a Soulstone by {c}%, and whenever a party member consumes a Healthstone you heal for {d}% of the amount it healed them for.

mana_feed.label: Mana Feed
mana_feed.description: When you gain mana from Drain Mana or Life Tap spells, your pet gains {a}% of the mana you gain.

master_demonologist.label: Master Demonologist
master_demonologist.description:
Grants both the Warlock and the summoned demon an effect as long as that demon is active.

Imp - Reduces threat caused by {a}%.

Voidwalker - Reduces physical damage taken by {b}%.

Succubus - Increases all damage caused by {b}%.

Felhunter - Increases all resistances by {c} per level.

Felguard - Increases all damage caused by {d}% and all resistances by {e} per level.

demonic_resilience.label: Demonic Resilience
demonic_resilience.description: Reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by melee and spells by {a}% and reduces all damage your summoned demon takes by {b}%.

soul_link.label: Soul Link
soul_link.description: When active, 20% of all damage taken by the caster is taken by your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, Felhunter, Felguard, or enslaved demon instead. That damage cannot be prevented. In addition, both the demon and master will inflict 5% more damage. Lasts as long as the demon is active and controlled.

demonic_knowledge.label: Demonic Knowledge
demonic_knowledge.description: Increases your spell damage by an amount equal to {a}% of the total of your active demon's Stamina plus Intellect.

demonic_tactics.label: Demonic Tactics
demonic_tactics.description: Increases melee and spell critical strike chance for you and your summoned demon by {a}%.

summon_felguard.label: Summon Felguard
summon_felguard.description: Summons a Felguard under the command of the Warlock.

improved_shadow_bolt.label: Improved Shadow Bolt
improved_shadow_bolt.description: Your Shadow Bolt critical strikes increase Shadow damage dealt to the target by {a}% until 4 non-periodic damage sources are applied. Effect lasts a maximum of 12 seconds.

cataclysm.label: Cataclysm
cataclysm.description: Reduces the Mana cost of your Destruction spells by {a}%.

bane.label: Bane
bane.description: Reduces the casting time of your Shadow Bolt and Immolate spells by {a} sec and your Soul Fire spell by {b} sec.

aftermath.label: Aftermath
aftermath.description: Gives your Destruction spells a {a}% chance to daze the target for 5 seconds.

improved_firebolt.label: Improved Firebolt
improved_firebolt.description: Reduces the casting time of your Imp's Firebolt spell by {a} sec and decreases its mana cost by {b}%. When your Imp's Firebolt critically hits, you have a {c}% chance to gain Impish Fire, increasing the initial damage of your next single target Fire spell by 10%.

improved_lash_of_pain.label: Improved Lash of Pain
improved_lash_of_pain.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Succubus' Lash of Pain spell by {a} sec.

devastation.label: Devastation
devastation.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Destruction spells by {a}%.

shadowburn.label: Shadowburn
shadowburn.description: Instantly blasts the target for 135 Shadow damage. If the target dies within 5 seconds of Shadowburn, and yields experience or honor, the caster gains a Soul Shard.

intensity.label: Intensity
intensity.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to resist interruption caused by damage while casting or channeling any Destruction spell.

destructive_reach.label: Destructive Reach
destructive_reach.description: Increases the range of your Destruction spells by {a}% and reduces threat caused by Destruction spells by {b}%.

improved_searing_pain.label: Improved Searing Pain
improved_searing_pain.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Searing Pain spell by {a}%.

pyroclasm.label: Pyroclasm
pyroclasm.description: Gives your Rain of Fire, Hellfire, and Soul Fire spells a {a}% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds. This chance is spread across the duration of Hellfire and Rain of Fire.

improved_immolate.label: Improved Immolate
improved_immolate.description: Increases the initial damage of your Immolate spell by {a}%.

ruin.label: Ruin
ruin.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Destruction spells by 100%.

shadowfury.label: Shadowfury
shadowfury.description: Shadowfury is unleashed, causing 156 Shadow damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yds for 3 seconds.

nether_protection.label: Nether Protection
nether_protection.description: After being hit with a Shadow or Fire spell, you have a {a}% chance to become immune to Shadow and Fire spells for 4 seconds.

emberstorm.label: Emberstorm
emberstorm.description: Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by {a}% and reduces the cast time of your Incinerate spell by {a}%.

backlash.label: Backlash
backlash.description: Increases your critical strike chance with spells by an additional {a}% and gives you a {a}% chance when hit by a physical attack to reduce the cast time of your next Shadow Bolt or Incinerate spell by 100%. This effect lasts 8 seconds and will not occur more than once every 8 seconds.

conflagrate.label: Conflagrate
conflagrate.description: Ignites a target that is already afflicted by your Immolate, dealing 272 Fire damage and consuming the Immolate spell.

soul_leech.label: Soul Leech
soul_leech.description: Gives your Shadow Bolt, Shadowburn, Soul Fire, Incinerate, Searing Pain and Conflagrate spells a {a}% chance to return health equal to 20% of the damage caused.

shadow_and_flame.label: Shadow and Flame
shadow_and_flame.description: Your Shadow Bolt and Incinerate spells gain an additional {a}% of your bonus spell damage effects.

demonic_sacrifice.label: Demonic Sacrifice
demonic_sacrifice.description:
When activated, sacrifices your summoned demon to grant you an effect that lasts 1800 seconds. The effect is canceled if any Demon is summoned.

Imp: Increases your Fire damage by 15%.

Voidwalker: Restores 2% of total health every 4 seconds.

Succubus: Increases your Shadow damage by 15%.

Felhunter: Restores 3% of total mana every 4 seconds.

Felguard: Increases your Shadow damage by 10% and restores 2% of total mana every 4 seconds.

arcane_subtlety.label: Arcane Subtlety
arcane_subtlety.description: Reduces your target's resistance to all your spells by {a} and reduces the threat caused by your Arcane spells by {b}%.

arcane_focus.label: Arcane Focus
arcane_focus.description: Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by {a}%.

improved_arcane_missiles.label: Improved Arcane Missiles
improved_arcane_missiles.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles.

wand_specialization.label: Wand Specialization
wand_specialization.description: Increases your damage with Wands by {a}%.

magic_absorption.label: Magic Absorption
magic_absorption.description: Increases all resistances by {a} and causes all spells you fully resist to restore {b}% of your total mana. 1 sec. cooldown.

arcane_concentration.label: Arcane Concentration
arcane_concentration.description: Gives you a {a}% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell hits a target. The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.

magic_attunement.label: Magic Attunement
magic_attunement.description: Increases the effect of your Amplify Magic and Dampen Magic spells by {a}%.

arcane_impact.label: Arcane Impact
arcane_impact.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Arcane spells by an additional {a}%.

arcane_blast.label: Arcane Blast
arcane_blast.description: Blasts the target with energy, dealing 199 Arcane damage. Each time you cast Arcane Blast, the casting time is reduced while mana cost is increased. Effect stacks up to 3 times and lasts 8 seconds.

improved_shielding.label: Improved Shielding
improved_shielding.description: Decreases the mana lost per point of damage taken when Mana Shield is active by {a}% and increases the resistances gained from Mage Armor by {b}%.

improved_counterspell.label: Improved Counterspell
improved_counterspell.description: Gives your Counterspell a {a}% chance to silence the target for 4 seconds.

arcane_meditation.label: Arcane Meditation
arcane_meditation.description: Allows {a}% of your mana regeneration to continue while casting.

improved_arcane_intellect.label: Improved Arcane Intellect
improved_arcane_intellect.description: Your Arcane Intellect and Arcane Brilliance spells also increase the target's maximum mana by {a}%.

presence_of_mind.label: Presence of Mind
presence_of_mind.description: When activated, your next Mage spell with a casting time less than 10 sec becomes an instant cast spell.

arcane_mind.label: Arcane Mind
arcane_mind.description: Increases your total Intellect by {a}% and increases your armor by an amount equal to {b}% of your Intellect.

prismatic_cloak.label: Prismatic Cloak
prismatic_cloak.description: Reduces all damage taken by {a}%, and for 4 seconds after casting Blink, your chance to be hit by all attacks and spells is reduced by 30%.

arcane_instability.label: Arcane Instability
arcane_instability.description: Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by {a}%.

arcane_potency.label: Arcane Potency
arcane_potency.description: Increases the critical strike chance of any spell cast while Clearcasting by {a}%.

empowered_arcane_missiles.label: Empowered Arcane Missiles
empowered_arcane_missiles.description: Your Arcane Missiles spell gains an additional {a}% of your bonus spell damage effects, but mana cost is increased by {b}%.

arcane_power.label: Arcane Power
arcane_power.description: When activated, your spells deal 30% more damage while costing 30% more mana to cast. This effect lasts 15 seconds.

spell_power.label: Spell Power
spell_power.description: Increases critical strike damage bonus of all spells by {a}%.

mind_mastery.label: Mind Mastery
mind_mastery.description: Increases spell damage by up to {a}% of your total Intellect.

slow.label: Slow
slow.description: Reduces target's movement speed by 50%, increases the time between ranged attacks by 50% and increases casting time by 50%. If the target is immune to movement speed reductions this spell enters a 2 minute cooldown and still applies the other effects. Lasts 15 seconds. Slow can only affect one target at a time.

improved_fireball.label: Improved Fireball
improved_fireball.description: Reduces the casting time of your Fireball spell by {a} sec.

impact.label: Impact
impact.description: Gives your Fire spells a {a}% chance to stun the target for 2 seconds.

ignite.label: Ignite
ignite.description: Your critical strikes from Fire damage spells cause the target to burn for an additional {a}% of your spell's damage over 4 seconds.

flame_throwing.label: Flame Throwing
flame_throwing.description: Increases the range of your Fire spells by {a} yards.

improved_blasting.label: Improved Blasting
improved_blasting.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire Blast spell by {a} sec and increases the critical strike chance of your Arcane Blast spell by {b}%.

incineration.label: Incineration
incineration.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Fire Blast and Scorch spells by {a}%.

improved_flamestrike.label: Improved Flamestrike
improved_flamestrike.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Flamestrike spell by {a}%.

pyroblast.label: Pyroblast
pyroblast.description: Hurls an immense fiery boulder that causes 216 Fire damage and an additional 56 Fire damage over 12 seconds.

burning_soul.label: Burning Soul
burning_soul.description: Gives your Fire spells a {a}% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage and reduces the threat caused by your Fire spells by {b}%.

improved_scorch.label: Improved Scorch
improved_scorch.description: Your Scorch spells have a {a}% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Fire damage. This vulnerability increases the Fire damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 30 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

molten_shields.label: Molten Shields
molten_shields.description: Causes your Fire Ward to have a {a}% chance to reflect Fire spells while active. In addition, your Molten Armor has a {b}% chance to affect ranged and spell attacks.

master_of_schools.label: Master of Schools
master_of_schools.description: Your spell criticals will refund {a}% of their base mana cost.

playing_with_fire.label: Playing with Fire
playing_with_fire.description: Increases all spell damage caused by {a}% and all spell damage taken by {a}%.

critical_mass.label: Critical Mass
critical_mass.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Fire spells by {a}%.

blast_wave.label: Blast Wave
blast_wave.description: A wave of flame radiates outward from the caster, damaging all enemies caught within the blast for 184 Fire damage, and Dazing them for 6 seconds.

pyroclastic_burst.label: Pyroclastic Burst
pyroclastic_burst.description: Your Fire spell criticals have a {a}% chance to increase the damage of your next Pyroblast by 10%, stacking up to 5 times. You cannot cast Presence of Mind while this effect is active.

blazing_speed.label: Blazing Speed
blazing_speed.description: Gives you a {a}% chance when hit by a melee or ranged attack to increase your movement speed by 50% and dispel all movement impairing effects. This effect lasts 8 seconds.

fire_power.label: Fire Power
fire_power.description: Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by {a}%.

pyromaniac.label: Pyromaniac
pyromaniac.description: Increases chance to critically hit and reduces the mana cost of all Fire spells by an additional {a}%.

combustion.label: Combustion
combustion.description: When activated, this spell causes each of your Fire damage spell hits to increase your critical strike chance with Fire damage spells by 10%. This effect lasts until you have caused 3 critical strikes with Fire spells.

molten_fury.label: Molten Fury
molten_fury.description: Increases damage of all spells against targets with less than 20% health by {a}%.

empowered_fireball.label: Empowered Fireball
empowered_fireball.description: Your Fireball spell gains an additional {a}% of your bonus spell damage effects.

dragons_breath.label: Dragon's Breath
dragons_breath.description: Targets in a cone in front of the caster take 385 Fire damage and are Disoriented for 3 seconds. Any direct damaging attack will revive targets. Turns off your attack when used.

frost_warding.label: Frost Warding
frost_warding.description: Increases the armor and resistances given by your Frost Armor and Ice Armor spells by {a}%. In addition, gives your Frost Ward a {b}% chance to reflect Frost spells and effects while active.

improved_frostbolt.label: Improved Frostbolt
improved_frostbolt.description: Reduces the casting time of your Frostbolt spell by {a} sec.

elemental_precision.label: Elemental Precision
elemental_precision.description: Reduces the mana cost and chance targets resist your Frost and Fire spells by {a}%.

ice_shards.label: Ice Shards
ice_shards.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Frost spells by {a}%.

frostbite.label: Frostbite
frostbite.description: Gives your Chill effects a {a}% chance to freeze the target in place for 5 seconds. If the target is immune to being frozen, it will be considered as frozen.

improved_frost_nova.label: Improved Frost Nova
improved_frost_nova.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Frost Nova spell by {a} sec.

permafrost.label: Permafrost
permafrost.description: Increases the duration of your Chill effects by {a} sec(s) and reduces the target's speed by an additional {b}%.

piercing_ice.label: Piercing Ice
piercing_ice.description: Increases the damage done by your Frost spells by {a}%. This effect is tripled against enemies that are immune to Fire damage.

icy_veins.label: Icy Veins
icy_veins.description: Hastens your spellcasting, increasing spell casting speed by 20% and gives you 100% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting. Lasts 20 seconds.

improved_blizzard.label: Improved Blizzard
improved_blizzard.description: Adds a chill effect to your Blizzard spell. This effect lowers the target's movement speed by {a}%. Lasts 1.5 seconds.

arctic_reach.label: Arctic Reach
arctic_reach.description: Increases the range of your Frostbolt, Ice Lance and Blizzard spells and the radius of your Frost Nova and Cone of Cold spells by {a}%.

frost_channeling.label: Frost Channeling
frost_channeling.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Frost spells by {a}% and reduces the threat caused by your Frost spells by {b}%.

shatter.label: Shatter
shatter.description: Increases the critical strike chance of all your spells against frozen targets by {a}%.

frozen_core.label: Frozen Core
frozen_core.description: Reduces the damage taken by Frost and Fire effects by {a}%.

cold_snap.label: Cold Snap
cold_snap.description: When activated, this spell finishes the cooldown on all Frost spells you recently cast.

improved_cone_of_cold.label: Improved Cone of Cold
improved_cone_of_cold.description: Increases the damage dealt by your Cone of Cold spell by {a}%.

ice_floes.label: Ice Floes
ice_floes.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Cone of Cold, Cold Snap, Ice Barrier and Ice Block spells by {a}%.

winters_chill.label: Winter's Chill
winters_chill.description: Gives your Frost damage spells a {a}% chance to apply the Winter's Chill effect, which increases the chance a Frost spell will critically hit the target by 2% for 15 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

ice_barrier.label: Ice Barrier
ice_barrier.description: Instantly shields you, absorbing 493 damage. Lasts 60 seconds. While the shield holds, spells will not be interrupted.

arctic_winds.label: Arctic Winds
arctic_winds.description: Increases all Frost damage you cause by {a}% and reduces the chance melee and ranged attacks will hit you by {a}%.

empowered_frostbolt.label: Empowered Frostbolt
empowered_frostbolt.description: Your Frostbolt spell gains an additional {a}% of your bonus spell damage effects and an additional {b}% chance to critically strike.

summon_water_elemental.label: Summon Water Elemental
summon_water_elemental.description: Summon a Water Elemental to fight for the caster for 45 seconds.
